definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Objective To analyze CT and MRI manifestations of intracranial trigeminal neurinoma .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析顱內三叉神經鞘瘤的CT和MRI表現。

sentences.english: The characteristic trigeminoma appeared as dumb bell with erosion of petrous bone.
sentences.chinese: 三叉神經瘤表現爲特徵性啞鈴形伴巖骨尖骨質破壞。

sentences.english: Theauthors realized that there is a sensitive area near the trigeminal nerve sensory root entry zone.
sentences.chinese: 作者觀察到三叉神經感覺根出橋腦處有一段敏感區。

sentences.english: This is the fifth, or trigeminal, cranial nerve.
sentences.chinese: 這是第五次，或三叉神經，顱神經。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of adriamycin to suborbital nerve and trigeminal ganglion in the rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察阿黴素對兔眶下神經及三叉神經節的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the diagnosis and treatment for patients with trigeminal schwannoma (TS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討三叉神經鞘瘤的診斷和治療方法。

sentences.english: The pit organ contains nerve fibres known as trigeminal ganglia.
sentences.chinese: 窩器內有三叉神經節的神經纖維。

sentences.english: Results The root entry zoon (REZ) of the trigeminal nerves were found compressed by vasculars in 89 cases.
sentences.chinese: 結果三叉神經入腦幹區有血管壓迫者89例。

sentences.english: Objective To provide anatomical data of trigeminal root for operation of the microvascular decompression (MVD).
sentences.chinese: 目的爲臨牀手術提供有關三叉神經根的解剖學資料。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnosis and operative approaches of trigeminal neurilemmomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討三叉神經鞘瘤的診斷與手術入路選擇。

sentences.english: The characteristic of trigeminal nerve tumor was that the tumor extended from pons cerebellum angle to juxtasella.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤從橋小腦角延伸到鞍旁是三叉神經瘤的特點。

sentences.english: The head causes facial trigeminal sweeny to have method of He Zhi cure after department operation.
sentences.chinese: 腦部手術後引起面部三叉神經肌肉萎縮有何治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the best surgical approach to remove of trigeminal neurinomas (TNs).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討三叉神經鞘瘤最佳外科手術入路。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the best method of making specimen of trigeminal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討三叉神經標本的最佳製作方法。
